hero.name: Amani Konan Dieudonné
hero.roles: Senior Data Scientist | AI Engineer | Statistician & Econometrician | Strategic Consultant
hero.description: Senior Data Scientist, AI Engineer & Statistician-Econometrician with 13+ years of international experience across Africa, Europe, and the Middle East. Trained at ENSEA Abidjan and Université Toulouse I Capitole, with advanced certificates from MIT. Specializing in AI/ML, data architecture, econometrics, and strategic consulting for international organizations.

home.who_i_am_text: Born in Didiévi, Côte d'Ivoire, I discovered my passion for numbers and data early on. That journey took me from ENSEA Abidjan — one of Africa's premier statistics schools — to a Master's in Statistics & Econometrics at Université Toulouse I Capitole in France, and advanced programs at MIT. Over 13+ years, I've served 11 organizations across 6+ countries — from the United Nations system (ITU, IOM, UNHCR, UNIDIR) to the International Cocoa Organization and the African Export-Import Bank. Today, I combine deep expertise in AI, data science, statistics, and econometrics to drive data-driven transformation for international organizations and African development. I am driven by a singular belief: Africa's prosperity must be built by Africans, powered by data and intelligence.
home.summary_text: A uniquely versatile professional combining deep expertise in data science, artificial intelligence, statistics, and econometrics. With over 13 years across 11 international organizations spanning the UN system, the International Cocoa Organization, development finance, and the private sector, I bridge the gap between rigorous quantitative analysis and practical, impactful solutions. From building enterprise AI systems and data architectures at Afreximbank to leading econometric analysis of global cocoa markets at ICCO, I bring a rare blend of technical depth and strategic vision to every engagement.
home.expertise_ds_desc: Advanced analytics, predictive modeling, and data-driven decision support for complex organizational challenges.
home.expertise_ai_desc: End-to-end ML pipelines, LLMs, RAG systems, NLP, and production-grade AI system deployment.
home.expertise_stats_desc: Statistical inference, econometric modeling, causal analysis, survey design, and impact evaluation.
home.expertise_de_desc: Lakehouse architectures, ETL/ELT pipelines, data governance (DAMA-DMBOK), and enterprise data platform design.
home.expertise_strategy_desc: Data strategy roadmaps, AI adoption advisory, digital transformation, and organizational capacity building.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Senior Data Scientist | AI Engineer | Statistician & Econometrician
about.bio: With over 13 years of experience across 11 international organizations in 6+ countries, I bring deep expertise in data science, artificial intelligence, statistics, and econometrics. Trained as a Statistics & Information Systems Engineer at ENSEA Abidjan and holding a Master's in Statistics & Econometrics from Université Toulouse I Capitole, I have further sharpened my skills through professional certificates from MIT in Data Engineering, AI & Data Science, and a MicroMasters in Data, Economics & Development Policy. My career spans the United Nations system (ITU, IOM, UNHCR, UNIDIR), the International Cocoa Organization (ICCO), the African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank), Barry-Callebaut, FHI360, ICRAF, and PAC-CI. I specialize in designing enterprise data architectures, deploying AI/ML models, conducting rigorous econometric analysis, and driving data strategy for complex international organizations.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Expert consulting and training services tailored to your needs
services.consulting_desc: Strategic advisory on AI adoption, data strategy, and digital transformation for enterprises and international organizations.
services.architecture_desc: Design and implementation of modern data platforms, lakehouse architectures, and enterprise data management solutions.
services.mlops_desc: End-to-end ML pipeline development, model deployment, monitoring, and optimization at scale.
services.training_desc: Customized training programs in data science, machine learning, and AI for teams and organizations.
services.statistics_desc: Rigorous statistical analysis, econometric modeling, survey design, causal inference, and impact evaluation for research and policy.
